span.strong: Olmsted Falls City School District is currently closed following Governor Mike DeWine's order closing all schools in Ohio due to the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak.

strong.span: to be redirected to our new

span.strong: OFCS Extended District Closure Resource Page.

div.div: Olmsted Falls City Schools provides experiences that empower its future graduates to become life-long learners who have explored career pathways of their interest so that they can succeed as citizens in a global society.
